programme.desc: PL Stories takes a look at the forgotten moments that truly defined a Premier League season, offering new perspectives on the games that shaped title races. programme.desc: This will be the first season whereby the UEFA Europa League will be played under a new format, which replaces the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Bundesliga - Special 2024/2025 - Hungry for Success
programme.desc: What do Jamal Musiala, Florian Wirtz, Jude Bellingham, Erling Haaland and Manuel Neuer have in common? They are all children of the Bundesliga, the league where they developed into stars of world format – whether thanks to excellent youth academy work, or equally excellent scouting.In our special report “Hungry for Success – the Bundesliga’s Bright Young Stars” we go behind the scenes at some of Germany’s top clubs. The Bundesliga has a long-established reputation for taking top prospects up to the next level. Every year, in one of the world’s strongest leagues, new stars are born and fresh foundations laid for extraordinary football careers.

programme.desc: The 2025 Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell (ATP 500) runs from April 14–20 at the Real Club de Tenis Barcelona. With a reduced 32-player draw, top names like Carlos Alcaraz, Tsitsipas, and Ruud headline the clay-court event. This edition also marks the first without Rafael Nadal and includes a tribute to Bjorn Borg on the 50th anniversary of his 1975 win.

programme.title: A Special Interview with Three Arab Tennis Stars

programme.title: Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs Luciano Darderi (ITA) - Final - Grand Prix Hassan 2 - Marrakech 2025 - AT
programme.desc: Top seed [1] Tallon Griekspoor (NED) brings his big serve and aggressive baseline game to the Marrakech final, facing [7] Luciano Darderi (ITA), a rising clay-court talent known for his resilience and tactical play. A breakthrough moment awaits—who will lift the Marrakech crown?

programme.title: Jakub Mensik (CZE) vs Novak Djokovic (SRB) - Final - Miami Open 2025 - presented by Itaú - ATP 1000

One win from history as youngest Miami champ ever.Across the net: Djokovic. The old lion prowls for his 7th Miami throne—still devouring dreamers.Tonight, fire meets fortress. The future charges at forever.

programme.title: Semi-Final 1 - ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 BMW Open in Munich makes its debut as an ATP 500 event, elevating its status on the professional tennis calendar. Held on the clay courts of MTTC Iphitos, the tournament features a 32-player singles draw and offers enhanced facilities, including a new 6,500-seat center court. This marks a significant step forward for one of Germany’s most historic and prestigious tennis events.

This edition also marks the first without Rafael Nadal and includes a tribute to Bjorn Borg on the 50th anniversary of his 1975 win.

programme.title: A Special Interview with Three Arab Tennis Stars
programme.desc: An exclusive joint interview featuring three rising Arab tennis talents — Hady Habib (Lebanon), Abdullah Shelbayh (Jordan), and Aziz Dougaz (Tunisia) — as they share their stories, ambitions, and experiences during their participation in the ATP 500 Qatar ExxonMobil Open 2025. In this candid conversation, the players reflect on their personal journeys, the challenges of representing their countries on the global stage, and their hopes for the future of Arab tennis.

programme.title: Jakub Mensik (CZE) vs Novak Djokovic (SRB) - Final - Miami Open 2025 - presented by Itaú - ATP 1000
programme.desc: 19-year-old Mensik, the Czech phenom, blasts into his first Masters final—taking down Top 10 giants with missile serves and fearless power. One win from history as youngest Miami champ ever.Across the net: Djokovic. The old lion prowls for his 7th Miami throne—still devouring dreamers.Tonight, fire meets fortress. The future charges at forever.

programme.title: Jenson Brooksby (USA) vs Frances Tiafoe (USA) - Fayez Sarofim and CO US Mens - Houston 2025- ATP 250
programme.desc: In the 2025 ATP 250 Houston final, it’s an all-American clash as rising star Jenson Brooksby takes on No. 2 seed and hometown favorite Frances Tiafoe. Brooksby, ranked No. 507, is into his fourth ATP final and still seeking his first title, while Tiafoe eyes a fourth career crown after winning in Houston (2023), Delray Beach (2018), and Stuttgart (2023). Brooksby leads their head-to-head 2–0, having beaten Tiafoe in Washington (2021) and Atlanta (2022).

programme.title: Final - ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 BMW Open in Munich makes its debut as an ATP 500 event, elevating its status on the professional tennis calendar. Held on the clay courts of MTTC Iphitos, the tournament features a 32-player singles draw and offers enhanced facilities, including a new 6,500-seat center court. This marks a significant step forward for one of Germany’s most historic and prestigious tennis events.

programme.title: EPL The Big Interview 2024/25 - Mikel Merino
programme.desc: It was the goal that made the footballing world stand up and take notice of Mikel Merino. In scoring the winner for Spain in the semi-finals of Euro 2024, his celebration paid homage to his father, who performed the same Iconic dance in the exact same stadium 33 years previously. This week on the Big Interview, Merino explains how his father has Inspired him, the influence hes taken from Basque culture, his surprise at finding out hed be playing as a striker at Arsenal and his thoughts on his first season in North London.

programme.title: ATP Masters 1000 Review 2025 - Monte Carlo
programme.desc: The Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters is a prestigious ATP Masters 1000 clay-court tournament held annually at the Monte Carlo Country Club in Roquebrune-Cap-Martin, France, near Monaco. Celebrating its 118th edition in 2025. As the first of three clay-court Masters 1000 tournaments each season, it attracts the worlds top tennis talent, offering valuable points and prize money. The tournament has seen legendary champions, with Rafael Nadal holding a record 11 titles.

programme.title: DTM 2025 - Season Preview
programme.desc: DTM. Three letters encapsulating motorsport tradition like few other racing series. Born in 1984, the DTM is coming off one of its strongest ever seasons under the guidance of the ADAC! Nine different race winners from the first nine races – including all six represented brands (Audi, BMW, Mercedes, Lamborghini, Porsche and Ferrari) – an unmistakable testament to the unique competitive balance! Supported by a comprehensive support package including the ADAC GT Masters and ADAC GT4 Germany – the DTM package combines heritage with a powerful drive and a glittering future!

The category will be run in support of selected rounds of the 2025 Formula One World Championship. As the championship is a spec series, all teams and drivers competing in the championship will run the same car, the new Dallara F2 2024. Invicta Racing are the reigning Teams Champions.

programme.title: Race - Session 01 - 2025 FIA World - Endurance Championship
programme.desc: The FIA WEC returns to Europe for Round 2 at the historic Imola circuit. Top manufacturers like Ferrari, Toyota, and Porsche compete in a six-hour endurance battle, navigating 21 challenging turns over 4.9 km. Expect strategic pit stops, variable weather conditions, and fierce competition as teams vie for championship points in the Hypercar and LMGT3 classes.

programme.title: Morocco vs Mali - Final CAF U17 Africa Cup of Nations Morocco 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 U-17 Africa Cup of Nations is the 15th edition of the biennial African youth football tournament organized by Confederation of African Football (CAF) for players aged 17 and below. Morocco was chosen as the host of this edition The top 10 teams will qualify for the 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup in Qatar as the CAF representatives. It is the first U-17 Africa Cup of Nations to feature 16 teams. Senegal are the defending champions.

programme.title: Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs Ben Shelton (USA) - Semi-Final 1 - ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 BMW Open in Munich makes its debut as an ATP 500 event, elevating its status on the professional tennis calendar. Held on the clay courts of MTTC Iphitos, the tournament features a 32-player singles draw and offers enhanced facilities, including a new 6,500-seat center court. This marks a significant step forward for one of Germany’s most historic and prestigious tennis events.

programme.title: Final - ATP 500 - Munich - BMW OPEN - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 BMW Open in Munich makes its debut as an ATP 500 event, elevating its status on the professional tennis calendar. Held on the clay courts of MTTC Iphitos, the tournament features a 32-player singles draw and offers enhanced facilities, including a new 6,500-seat center court. This marks a significant step forward for one of Germany’s most historic and prestigious tennis events.

programme.title: Adana Demirspor vs Trabzonspor - Turkish Super Lig 2024/25 Week 32
programme.desc: The Turkish Super Lig is the top-flight competition of the Turkish football league system and is live and exclusive on beIN SPORTS. The season runs from August to May, with each club playing 38 matches. Matches are played Friday through to Monday. Galatasaray are the current Champions.

programme.title: Race 1 - Imola Round - Porsche Cup Germany
programme.desc: The season kicks off at the iconic Imola circuit, where rising stars and seasoned drivers battle wheel-to-wheel in Race 1 of the Porsche Carrera Cup Germany. Precision driving, high-speed action, and the debut of sustainable fuel technology set the tone for an electrifying season opener.

programme.title: Nantes vs Nimes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.
